snippet: New York City Ballet’s program “À la Russe” included “Russian Seasons,” “Allegro Brillante,” “Zakouski” and “Stravinsky Violin Concerto.”
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews concert of several Russian ballet works performed by the New York City Ballet at the David H Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: New York City Ballet’s program “À la Russe” included “Russian Seasons,” “Allegro Brillante,” “Zakouski” and “Stravinsky Violin Concerto.”

headline.seo: Ratmansky’s ‘Russian Seasons’ From New York City Ballet
headline.main: Hints of Russian Folk Tales, With Joy, Pathos and Physical Fireworks
headline.print_headline: Hints of Russian Folk Tales, With Joy, Pathos and Physical Fireworks
